To buy cement, sand and other materials needed in their business, Liberty requested a PHP 30,000 loan from KIVA lenders. Through this loan, Liberty hopes to improve the business and wishes to encourage more customers and gain more profits as well.

loans.use: buy cement for her block-making business

loans.name: Farangis

texts.en:
Faragis is a wonderful young lady. She is 19 years old. She is single and lives with her parents in the northern part of Tajikistan. She always wanted to be successful in business.  

Farangis is going to start a business selling food items. She is going to organize her business in the local market. Her mother will help her with the business.  She studied at the course ‘To Get Ahead’ from a women organization. 

Faragis is asking for a loan of 2000 Somonis to buy food items to sell. She awaits your support and kindness.

loans.use: buy food items to sell

loans.name: Mukama Yemubeezi Kisunku Group

texts.en:
Teddy is a married woman with three children. She is twenty five years old. Teddy is a member of Mukama Wemubezi Kisunku group, which has nine members. This is her third loan cycle.  She has received a loan of 500,000, 1,000,000 and 1,000,000 UGX respectively.

Teddy is a business woman who deals in a retail shop trading selling daily household use items.  She works seven days a week and each day she works for seventeen hours. She has been in this business since 2009.  She started this business with the aim of supplementing her husband’s family income. She sells her products to residents in rural setting.

Teddy has acquired this loan so that she can purchase more daily household use items which are usually consumed by her customers. Her hopes are to expand her business to the level of wholesale trading and to set up more outlets on the outskirts of her town.

Teddy’s challenges are delay of payments by customers who took goods on credit and lack of enough capital to finance her business.  She describes herself as an honest and hard-working lady and asks lenders to continue extending their services to the local people so that they can develop themselves.

loans.use: buy household goods to resell

loans.name: Noor Jahan

texts.en:
Noor Jahan is a 37-year-old married woman living with her spouse and 3 children in Lahore, Pakistan.  Her husband is a fruit vendor and sells fruits in their  hometown. He goes daily to fruit markets to buy fresh fruits such as mangoes, bananas, apples, etc.   He is very famous in the community due to the freshness of his fruits.  

Noor Jahan's husband has been selling fruits for many years, because of this he understands the minds and demands of the people.  Due to Ramadan, the demand has increased and he wants to buy more fruits to sell.  In this way, he would be able to fulfill the demand and can easily get more profit. Therefore, Noor Jahan requested a loan of RS 25,000 so that her husband would be able to buy more fruits, especially mangoes.

This is the first loan for Noor Jahan.  She promises to us that she will pay all installments on time because she wants to take a larger loan in the future. 

Noor Jahan is very thankful to the Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: buy fruits to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy toilet detergents, soaps, sweets and other retail goods.

loans.name: Zaverio

texts.en: Zaverio is a tomato seller and also deals in the cattle trade. He is 36 years old and has three children. He longs for his children to have all that they need. This desire for his children to live a comfortable life prompted him to begin this business. He sells to market traders who deal in fresh vegetables. He wants to use this loan to buy pesticides for his farm. Zaverio hopes to raise more income from the produce. He is hard working. In the photograph, Zaverio poses with his youngest child.

loans.use: To buy pesticides

loans.name: Husam

texts.en:
Husam is an Iraqi client who is 34 years old, married and the father of three children. Husam is the only provider for his family.
Husam owns a small shop where he sells shoes and slippers. He established his business in 2010 and since then, he has been supporting his family with the profit gained from this shop. Husam gained good experience in this field and is well-known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation thanks to his affordable and competitive prices. 
Husam is requesting a loan of $2,400 USD. He will use this loan to install some shelves on the walls of the shop, install a rolling shutter and a sunshade. Husam is aiming to enhance his current financial condition by expanding his business and increasing his profits.

loans.use: to install some shelves on the walls of the shop, install a rolling shutter and a sunshade

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is married with two children who both go to school. Her husband is a businessman and he supports his family financially. They live in their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Fatuma has operated a paraffin-selling business for the past year and her customers are her neighbors and passersby. Her major challenge is transportation. 

With a loan of 10,000 KES, she wants to purchase jerrycans of paraffin for her business. She dreams of expanding her business to earn more income in the future.

loans.use: to purchase jerrycans of paraffin for her business

loans.name: Hussain

texts.en:
Hussain is a married youth client from Iraq. He is 23 years old and lives with his parents and his two brothers. Hussain, his father and brothers provide the family income. 
Hussain owns a shop where he sells electrical appliances like refrigerators, ovens, washing machines and air conditioners. He has worked in this field for several years as an employee and gained all the needed experience. In 2012, Hussain established his own, independent business and has been growing it rapidly with experience. 
Hussain is requesting a youth loan of $2,400 USD to install a rolling shutter, signage and a display window for his shop, as well as to install some shelves on the walls of this shop. Hussain is aiming to grow his business so that he may be able to provide himself a stable career.

loans.use: to install a rolling shutter, signage and a display window for his shop, as well as install some shelves on the walls of this shop

loans.name: Deifilio Basilio

texts.es:
Deifilio tiene 62 años de edad, es soltero, tiene 3 hijos, vive con sus  hijos en  la comunidad Cruz de Peran Cantn Chillanes Provincia Bolvar.

Deifilio   se dedica a la agricultura, siembra de tomate árbol, maíz. 

Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, insumos, abonos . 

 Las  compras lo realizan en Chillanes cada semana.

 Con el apoyo del crédito podrá cubrir sus necesidades y comprar los fertilizantes y abonos al contado a menor precio. 

Su desafío fue los fenómenos naturales y plagas. 
Su sueño es  arreglar la casa.  En el tiempo libre  le gusta  visitar a la familia.
texts.en:
Deifilio, 62, is single and has three children, who live with him in Cruz de Peran in the Chillanes canton of Bolivar province. Deifilio plants tomatoes and corn. He has applied for a loan to buy fertilizer, supplies, and manure. He makes his purchases in Chillanes weekly. 

The loan will cover his needs and let him buy fertilizer and manure at lower prices. Weather and pests have been his biggest challenges. He dreams of renovating his house. He likes to spend his free time with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, supplies, and manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase spare parts for vehicle repairs.

loans.name: Karen Isabel

texts.es: La señora Karen Habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su esposo e hijos, ella sueña con poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida ya que para ella es muy importante el bienestar de su familia, su esposo la apoya con los gastos del hogar ya que trabaja para una empresa privada, ella por su parte, tiene un negocio de venta de Frutas y verduras, con este credito podra invertir mas en su negocio comprando frutas y verduras para poder obtener mejores ingresos y asi poder mejorar sus condiciones de Vida, Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y fondos Kiva le estan brindado.
texts.en:
Karen lives in the city of Ticuantepe with her husband and children. She dreams of better living conditions because her family's well being is very important to her. Her husband helps pay household expenses, as he works for a private company. 

Karen has a fruit and vegetable business. She will use this loan to invest in her business by buying more fruits and vegetables. She will be able to earn more and improve her standard of living. She thanks Afodenic and Kiva for their support.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Arjan

texts.en:
Arjan needs to repair the vehicle that he uses for transportation in his little business of distributing beer and water bottles to stores and restaurants.  “Since my vehicle broke down, I have been so stressed out because I haven’t been able to bring money home anymore,” is what Arjan said to the loan officer in despair.

Arjan is a 32-year-old single man who lives in a major city in southeastern Albania. This city is known for producing the best Albanian beer dating back a very long time. He started his little business five years ago and according to him the money that he has been making hasn’t been that bad.

Arjan is requesting a loan of 200,000 Albanian Lek to repair the damaged vehicle.

loans.use: to repair the vehicle that he uses for transportation in his distributing business

loans.name: Daysi

texts.es:
La  señora  Deysi  es  una  persona  muy  emprendedora, responsable y trabajadora  que vive con sus 2 hijos en una comunidad  en la zona  sur de Honduras.
Doña Deysi su negocio es la venta de ropa actividad que realiza a diario, sale a vender a los caseríos cercanos a su comunidad y es así como obtiene sus ingresos. El préstamo lo necesita para comprar más pantalones, camisas, faldas, blusas, vestidos, etc. y así tener más mercadería para la venta.
Doña Deysi  tienen bastante demanda de clientes y  para poder satisfacerlas  necesita el crédito, espera que dentro de algunos años su negocio siga creciendo y le brinde los suficientes ingresos para mejorar su nivel de vida y poder enviar a sus hijos a estudiar y puedan salir adelante. 




Choluteca, Honduras –  Julio  del 2013
texts.en:
Deysi is enterprising, responsible, and hardworking. She lives with her two children in southern Honduras. Deysi sells clothing door-to-door in her neighborhood to earn income each day. She needs the loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, blouses, and dresses so that she has more inventory to sell. 

Deysi needs the loan to meet customer demand. She hopes her business will grow over the next few years and provide enough income to raise her standard of living and to educate and provide for her children.

Choluteca, Honduras –  July 2013

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, blouses, dresses, and more for her business.

loans.name: Ruth Esther

texts.es: La joven Ruth, tiene la edad de 24 años, es casada Lic. en Administración de Empresas, labora para una textilera devengando un salario mínimo con el que tiene que mantener su hogar. El crédito lo solicita para comprarse una computadora, que le beneficiara en desarrollarse mejor como profesional y también le serviría de ayuda a sus hermanos, dicho equipo.
texts.en: Ruth, 24, is married and graduated in business administration. The minimum wage she earns working for a textile firm pays her household expenses. She will use this loan to buy a computer, which will help her develop professionally and also help her brothers.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en: Ibrahim is 40 years old. He lives in the Changamwe area of Mombasa, Kenya. He has a photography shop. He wants to add a video camera so that he is able to serve more clients. He also owns a motorbike which transports people and earns him an income. He wants to grow his business to a level that it is stable. The challenge he faces in the business is that customers do not collect their photos on time. He discovered Milango through friends and now he is seeking a loan to buy a video camera. He is a married man blessed with three children aged 13, 8 and 7 years. All his children attend school. Income from the loan use will help him improve the family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a video camera.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en: Simon, 26, is a married man with one child living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been a police officer for three years and he is deployed to look after Queen Elizabeth National Park. Low salaries and poor working conditions are his challenges, while his dream is to upgrade in his studies so as to gain a promotion. Simon intends to use the loan to pay his school fees.

loans.use: to pay his school fees.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos, un hombre emprendedor , tiene 51 años de edad, es casado y vive con su esposa actualmente, el solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  comprar insumos como abonos, y fumigantes, el desea dar asistencia a los cultivos de café, con la finalidad de mantenerlas en buenas condiciones durante su desarrollo, para obtener un producto de buena calidad , la única delimitación que este caballero tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que él hace una solicitud  de  crédito , y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en:
Carlos is a 51 year old entrepreneurial man who is married and lives with his wife. He requested a loan with the desire to buy supplies including fertilizers and fumigants. He would like to support his coffee crops in order to keep them in good condition during their development so that he will obtain a high quality product. 

The only barrier that this gentleman has is a lack of money to continue growing. He depends on this economic activity in order to get ahead. This is why he made this loan request, which is his first to receive from FUDECOSUR. He does not have loans with any state run banks but FUDECOSUR has offered him this loan with greater ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Enkhbayar

texts.en: Enkhbayar, 29, lives with his wife and one year old baby in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a two-room apartment. He has been working as a manager since 2011 and during his day off he renders taxi services to local people using his own automobile. Recently, he has been the only one who is generating family income because his wife is looking after their child at home. The apartment they live in becomes cold during the winter, so he wants to prepare in advance by insulating his walls and installing vacuum insulated windows into the apartment. Therefore, he is requesting a loan of 4200000 MNT. As a result, his family will be able to live in a comfortable and warm place without worrying about his wife and child catching cold. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to insulate his walls and install vacuum windows.

loans.name: Maria Cruz

texts.es:
Doña María con 43 años de edad es ama de casa y agricultora madre de 9 hijos los cuales como una gran familia se apoyan mutuamente para sacar adelante el negocio de la familia como ser la siembra y venta de café. Ella en compañía de su compañero de hogar se ha dedicado a esta actividad hace más de 30 años y fue por interés propio que ella decidió aprender a trabajar la tierra en compañía de sus padres ya que ellos son agricultores desde toda una vida. Sus clientes son los vecinos e intermediarios que llegan y viven en la zona donde ella habita al igual que el mercado local y en los lugares aledaños. El terreno que ella en compañía de su esposo y sus hijos trabaja es propio y lo adquirió gracias a la compra que hicieron a uno de sus clientes el cual les facilito a ellos obtener un terreno para trabajar lo propio y está ubicado en el mismo lugar donde está construida su casa de habitación.

Ella actualmente necesita un apoyo económico para la compra de insumos agrícolas para proteger sus cultivos de café con los cuales al final de la cosecha ella planea vender el grano y obtener ingresos para re invertir en sus cultivos.    

Los planes y sueños a futuro son los de comprar más tierra para poder seguir cultivando café y ofrecer una mejor variedad como el caturra, lempira, etc. que son productos competitivos en el mercado y más atractivos para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Maria, 43, is a homemaker and farmer.  She's the mother of nine children who help each other get ahead, as in any big family.  The family business is growing and selling coffee.  She and her live-in companion have done this work for more than 30 years.

Through her own interest she decided to learn to farm with her parents, who have farmed their entire lives.  Her customers are neighbors and intermediaries who come to or live in the area where she lives.  She also sells in the local market and in nearby places.

The land that she and her husband and their children farm is her own.  She acquired it thanks to one of her customers, who facilitated the sale.  It's located in the same place where their house is built.

Currently she needs some economic support to buy inputs to protect her coffee crop, which she'll sell.  At the end of the harvest she plans to sell the beans and earn income to re-invest in her crops.

Her plans and dreams for the future are to buy more land to be able to continue growing coffee and offer a better variety, such as caturra and lempira beans, which are competitive products in the market and more attractive for her customers.

loans.use: To buy agricultural inputs

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
La Joven Nilda tiene 23 años de edad, es una persona muy luchadora y responsable vive junto a su familia en  una comunidad al sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la venta de golosinas en su  comunidad y demás caseríos cercanos a la misma. 
Nilda necesita el préstamo para la compra plátanos, yuca, cebolla, repollo, queso, salsas, tortillas, manteca, etc. Para seguir con su negocio, espera que el préstamo le sirva de mucho ya que gracias a este contara con los productos necesarios para seguir  realizando su trabajo y cubriendo la demanda de sus clientes.
Nilda  espera que sus ventas aumenten y mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y el de su familia desea  que su negocio crezca en unos años y así poder seguir apoyando a su familia para que cumplan sus metas y sueños como de que sus hermanos no dejen de estudiar y así puedan tener mayores oportunidades en el futuro.



Choluteca, Honduras –  Agosto  2013
texts.en:
Young Nilda is 23 years old and is a feisty and responsible person.  She lives with her family in a community south of Honduras.  She has a business selling sweets in her own and in nearby communities.

Nilda needs a loan in order to buy plantains, yucca, onion, cabbage, cheese, sauces, tortillas, butter, and more, to continue with her business.  She hopes this loan will be a great help to her as, thanks to it, she will have all the necessary products to keep on working and meeting her customers' demands.

Nilda hopes that her sales will increase and she will be able to improve her and her family's quality of life.  She wants her business to grow in some years so that she can continue to support her family as they achieve their goals and dreams - her siblings do not want to stop studying as they want better opportunities in the future.

Choluteca, Honduras; August 2013.

loans.use: to buy plantains, yucca, onion, cabbage, cheese, sauces, tortillas, butter, and more, for her business.

loans.name: Nimaika

texts.en:
Nimaika is married with three children who go to school. They live in their own house that has no electricity but has piped water. 

Nimaika has operated a paraffin business for over one and half years. She faces the major challenge of transportation in her business. 

With the KSHS 15,000 loan, she wants to purchase jerrycans of paraffin for her business. She dreams of expanding her business to earn more income in the future.

loans.use: to purchase jerrycans of paraffin for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase fruits, including mangoes, apples, avocados, and bananas.

loans.name: Maryluz

texts.es: Maryluz tiene 33 años,  es una  mujer casada con dos hermosas hijas. Es una persona emprendedora, honesta, responsable, sencilla y tiene un sueño por cumplir desde hace muchos años. Es un proyecto de vida a largo plazo que no ha podido realizar por muchas circunstancias pero le ha llegado el momento de hacerlo realidad, ya que sus hijas ya están grandes y puede empezar a trabajar en una empresa de plásticos. Quiere estudiar AUXILIAR EN  ENFERMERIA  ya que para ella es lo máximo, y así poder ayudar a personas que tanto lo necesitan, atenderlas en momentos tan difíciles, poderles brindar un medicamento,  ayudarlos a trasladar de un lado a otro, alimentarlos ,consentirlos y así hacerles mas llevaderas las dolencias  que puedan tener en el momento.  Hacer practicas en otras áreas como cuidados intensivos, urgencias, sobretodo en partos son algunas de las áreas que mas le interesan. Ya que es madre se da cuenta de lo hermoso que es ver nacer  un una criatura inocente a cada instante. Quiere ser parte de la familia AUXILIAR EN  ENFERMERIA y así poder tener un trabajo mas estable  donde gane un poco mas y poder brindarle  a su familia un futuro mejor.  Gracias a la oportunidad que el convenio Kiva le puede brindar espera alcanzar el sueño que tanto ha querido realizar.
texts.en: Maryluz is 33 years old. She is a married woman with two beautiful daughters. She is an enterprising, honest, responsible, humble woman who has had a dream for many years. It is a long term life project that she hasn't been able to do due to many circumstances but the time has come to make it a reality, since her daughters are big and she can start working in a plastics company. She wants to study Assistant Nursing. For her this is the utmost, and this way she can help people who need it so much, taking care of them during their difficult times, giving them medication, helping them move from one place to another, feeding them, coddling them, and making any pain they may have feel lighter. She wants to do practical studies in other areas such as intensive care and emergency, especially in deliveries. These are some of the areas that she is the most interested in. Since she is a mother she realizes how beautiful it is to see an innocent baby be born every minute. She wants to be a part of the Assistant Nursing family and thus be able to have a more stable job where she earns a little more and be abel to offer her family a better future. Thanks to the opportunity that the Kiva agreement can give her, she hopes to attain her dream that she has wanted to make come true so much.

loans.use: to finance the first semester of a nursing program in CampoAlto

loans.name: Cristina Yineth

texts.es:
Cristina  es  una niña que desde pequeña quería estudiar medicina su sueño era ser una doctora buena,  en su trabajo quería especializarse en pediatría,  ya que siempre le han gustado los niños; con el pasar del tiempo Cristina quería estudiar otras profesiones psicóloga, profesora, abogada, y hasta azafata  pero a pesar de esas carreras nunca olvido su sueño de ser médico.

En su último año de bachillerato no sabía que hacer ya que dentro de poco saldría de aquella época de amigos, diversión y travesuras que tanto disfrutaba, para salir al mundo real donde hay que luchar para lograr cosas mejores, después de su grado,  cristina empezó averiguar sobre los estudios que quería realizar pero ya en esa época se le había olvidado su sueño ya que mucha gente le decía que para esa carrera se necesitaba mucho más que la simple voluntad.

Con esa simples palabras cristina abandono su sueño y empezó a buscar las otras carreras que quería estudiar un día hablando con su hermano él le pregunto que había pasado con su sueño,  ya que el recordaba que desde pequeña cristina jugaba a la doctora con sus muñecos, ella respondió que por no tener el dinero suficiente no pudo estudiar eso aunque hubiera dado todo para estudiar medicina.

El hermano de cristina le dijo que no abandonara su sueño que estudiara auxiliar en enfermería,de esta forma podria ubicarse laboralmente y continuar con Medicina como carrera profesional. 

cristina lo pensó y le dio la razón así que empezó a estudiar auxiliar en enfermería,   ya lleva un semestre y le encanta,  ella sabe que al salir a trabajar en un hospital como auxiliar se puede pagar la enfermería superior y al acabar con esa puede pagarse su carrera de medicina y especializarse en pediatría.

Lo que más le gusta a cristina de enfermería es aprender a suministrar medicamentos, canalizar,  sacar sangre, curar heridas sabe que al pasar por todo eso puede llegar a ser una gran doctora .

Esta es la historia de cristina una adolecente que desde niña quería ser doctora y que poco a poco y con esfuerzo y dedicación lograr aquel sueño de ser la mejor médico pediatra y sacar adelante a su familiar y hacer que se sientan orgullosos de ella.
texts.en:
Cristina is a young woman who always wanted to study medicine when she was little because her dream was to be a good doctor.  Her specialty was going to be pediatrics because she always liked children.  Over time, Cristina has wanted to study different professions such as psychology, teaching, law and even to be a flight attendant, but she never forgot about her dream of being a doctor.

In her senior year of high school she was unsure about what to do because she would soon be leaving a time of friendships, partying and playing pranks, which she enjoyed so much, and going into the real world where one must struggle to get better things.  After graduation, Cristina starting looking into what she wanted to study but had forgotten her dream because many people said the degree required a lot more than simply wanting to be something.

With those simple words, Cristina abandoned her dream and started looking at other careers.  One day while talking to her brother he asked what had happened to her dream, because he remembered that Cristina used to play doctor with her dolls.  She said she could not study medicine because she did not have enough money.

Cristina's brother told her not to abandon her dream and to study to be a nurse auxiliary which would be a good line of work to go into so she could get into medicine professionally.

Cristina thought about it and decided to study to be a nursing auxiliary and after one semester she is thrilled.  She knows that when she finds a job at a hospital she will be able to pay for a nursing degree and after that she can pay for a medical degree and go into pediatrics.

What she likes most is learning about giving out medication, drawing blood, curing wounds and knowing that she can become a great doctor.

This is the story of Cristina, an adolescent who always wanted to become a doctor and little by little, with effort and dedication will realize her dream of becoming the best pediatrician in order to provide for her family and make them proud of her.

loans.use: To continue her second semester of nursing in Campoalto

loans.name: Brayan

texts.es: Brayan, Para estudiar  y crecer   y mejorar su calidad de vida  busco la asesoría para poder cumplir su sueño de estudiar. Oyendo los consejos de varias personas las cuales aseguraron que la institución  campo alto brindaba las mejores oportunidades para estudiar una carrera. Técnica laboral y por esta misma ingresar al ámbito laboral estudiando el técnico auxiliar administrativo empresarial. Hoy en día  Con grandes ganas salir adelante con el ayudo de conocimientos y estrategias e  implementar el nivel  de estudios  para una intachable hoja de vida y surgir con una carrera y un título por el cual tenga opciones de brindar sus  soluciones a una empresa.
texts.en: Brayan, to study and grow and improve his quality of life, sought advice to help him achieve his goal of studying. Various people assured him that the institution CampoAlto offered the best opportunities to choose a degree that would give him on-the-job experience and thereby entry into the work world. Hearing their advice, today he is studying business administration, motivated to get ahead with the help of the knowledge and the strategies and to implement his level of studies to obtain an impeccable resume. He will get ahead with a degree, and with a title which will give him the option to provide his solutions to a business.

loans.use: To enroll in the first semester of the Business Administration program at CampoAlto.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem is a 50-year-old married woman. She is a mother of two children. She adores her family and her husband works very hard so that his family can have a good and respectable life. Her husband has been running a clothing business for many years. This is the only source of income for his family. He purchases a variety of clothes with the purpose of reselling it at a profitable price. Currently, he needs additional capital to purchase clothes for the shop. However, due to lack of finances, he is facing hurdles.

Naseem is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband. He will use the loan to increase his supply of clothing so he can respond quickly to customer needs. He plans to expand his business with the additional income he earns. Naseem hopes that the loan will be helpful for her husband's business. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en: Mohammed is a 23-year-old single man who lives in Taiz, Yemen. Mohammed's business is a small grocery store where he sells basic food items and soft drinks. He has been in this business for five years. He started running the business when he felt his dad was unable to work in the same field again. He tends to his customers who come to him every day. Mohammed would like to invest this loan in the expansion of his business. He has applied for a youth loan of 100,000 Yemeni rials from AMB. With this money, he wants to buy grocery items like sweets, soft drinks, soaps, etc. With the increased income, he will improve his family’s quality of life. In the future, he would like to expand his business in order to be a great merchant.

loans.use: to buy grocery items like sweets, soft drinks, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add seasonal bridal dresses to her store

loans.name: Munazza

texts.en: Munazza is 32-year-old vigorous lady who has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she requested a loan of Rs 20,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan to buy more reels of threads in different colors with packs of lace, zippers and buttons. In this way, she will be able to complete the orders of her customers on time. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and wishes to spend part of the profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy more thread, laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en: Bushra is a 38-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. She has five months of experience in this field.  Her husband assists her by purchasing a stock of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. She is a mother of five children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and oil to meet with the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and oil.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.es: Maricel tiene la edad de 36 años, está casada y vive con el esposo y tres hijos actualmente. Ella el crédito lo quiere para la compra de abono y dar asistencia a una plantación de café que quieren iniciar. Ella desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo para que este le permita tener una mayor producción y así tener mayores ingresos económicos. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productora. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Maricel, 36, is married and currently lives with her husband and three children.  She wants a loan to buy soil amendments and take care of a coffee farm she wants to start.  She wants to properly maintain the plants so she can have a bigger crop and, consequently, more income.

She hopes to give her family a better quality of life and economic stability in the future, and to continue growing as a person and as a farmer.

This is her first loan from FUDECOSUR.  She hadn't had loans previously in state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered her a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en:
Tahira is a 32-year-old married woman and she has been running a business of milk sales with her husband for the past five years. She has two buffaloes in milk and sells their milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and cheese that she makes from the milk.  She looks after the buffaloes and performs the task of collecting milk from them while her husband sells it to different places on a daily basis. They are happily doing it together to support their family.

She is the mother of three children; two of them are school-going. She needs to increase her earnings to meet their everyday expenditures including food, clothing and education. In order to make huge profits, she requested for a loan of 25,000 PKR to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers. She hopes to get an increase in the production capacity of milk, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes and cloth material

loans.name: Fariha

texts.en:
Fariha is a 49-year-old Lebanese widowed woman living with her two children. After her husband’s death, she became the one and only income source for her family.  

She has sold clothes, gifts and accessories from her home beginning many years ago. Fariha looks to progressively expand her business; that’s why she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l.  She aims to open a small store, where she will better display her products and therefore attract more customers, thus increasing her revenues.  She doesn’t have employees helping her.  She works really hard by herself all day long to earn a good income and be able to support her children well. 

This is Fariha’s first Kiva loan, and she is sure that she will meet her business objectives in a short period thanks to it.

loans.use: to open a small clothing store.

loans.name: Nasreen's Group

texts.en:
Nasreen is a 43-year old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband sells fodder (animal feed) in a nearby village.  Here most of the people keep cattle at their houses for getting milk, beef, and mutton, and also for pulling carts. Here there is a lot of demand for fodder from those people who keep cattle. His shop is situated in a poor society and most of his customers took fodder on a credit basis and do not pay their debts for many days. Now, his credit amount has gone out of limit and even he cannot buy fresh fodder to sell.

Nasreen is a poor lady and cannot sustain such kinds of irregularities in payments because fodder selling is only one way of getting income for her family. Therefore, Nasreen requested a loan of 30,000 PKR so that her husband would be able to buy fodder to sell.

Now, her husband will avoid selling fodder on a credit basis and she hopes that this loan can easily fulfill the deficiencies.  Nasreen is very thankful to Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for this honorable support. 

Note: Nasreen raises her hand in the given picture.

loans.use: to buy fodder to resell

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is a married woman and has four children who go to school. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past two years, she has operated a dumpling-selling business. She faces a major challenge of inadequate capital.

With the 10,000 KES, she wants to purchase cooking oil, wheat flour and sugar for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, wheat flour and sugar for her business

loans.name: Rubeena

texts.en:
Rubeena is a 55 year old married woman.  She is a hardworking mother, who is helping her family by providing tailoring services in her community. She has been doing it for many years. 

She knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns enough to lead a decent life. To help her continue the operations of her business, she requested for a loan of PKR 20,000 to buy a stock of thread in different colors along with  packs of zippers, buttons and laces to meet increasing demand. 

In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy a stock of thread in different colors along with packs of zippers, buttons and laces.

loans.name: Zef

texts.en:
Zef has been acting as an agricultural counselor in his district for a very long time.  In addition, he has been running his animal husbandry activity.

“I have enjoyed doing both so far; I keep myself busy, and this is very important for a restless person like me. I have my wife to help me as well; it’s too much for one person, no matter how much I desire to do it all. She does the milking of the animals and takes the dairy products to the local dairy farm,” said Zef, recognizing his wife's efforts.

Zef, who lives in Northern Albania, is in his early 60's and is a married father of three grown up children. He is now requesting a loan to add one more dairy cow to the existing herd.  In the backgrouond of the photograph, you can see an adorable newborn baby calf.

loans.use: to add one more milk cow to the existing herd.

loans.name: Matia

texts.en:
Matia is a Ugandan, aged 38, married with four children, living in Kagadi, Uganda. He deals in produce as his stable source of income, earning side income from farming. He works hard to satisfy the growing family needs and educate all his children, but suffers from limited capital in his business. He hopes to buy more land later on for his children’s secure future.

Matia is requesting a loan to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Khursheed

texts.en:
Khursheed, age 35, is a married woman. She deals in the business of selling spices, which are commonly used in food for taste. She purchases spices in bulk from wholesale markets and then sells them in packs of various sizes to the people of her community. 

She has become famous by providing good quality spices in her locality, and earns enough to support a decent life. She is a responsible mother of three children, and needs to earn more to cover the daily expenditures of her family members. 

For this reason, she requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to buy a stock of salt, red chilies, black pepper and turmeric in large quantities. It will help her to increase her sales. 

She is in her sixth loan cycle, and has shown good repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize her earned profit for her children’s education and well-being.

loans.use: to buy a stock of salt, red chilies, black pepper and turmeric in large quantities.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Khalida, a 35-year-old married mother of five children, is trying hard to meet their needs for food, health, clothing, and education. Four years ago she started her general store business to contribute to the family income. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has many customers who regularly shop at her store.

To fully stock her store, Khalida has requested her third loan for Rs 35,000 to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour. These purchases will enable her to meet increasing customer demand consistently. She will use some of her profits to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Haneen

texts.en:
Haneen is 19 years old. She lives in Zarqa, Jordan with her family which consists of four members. Haneen is studying for a Diploma of Hospital Management first year. Her aim is to work in her study field after graduation to earn income which will help her cover her needs. 

Haneen is not able to pay her study fees because of the financial problems that she is facing. Now she is seeking a loan to pay her semester fees.

loans.use: To pay her study fees

loans.name: Ada Olinda

texts.es:
Ada tiene 46 años de edad es agricultora y ama de casa, madre de una hija la cual es menor de edad y en compañía de su compañero de hogar trabajan la tierra especialmente el cultivo de café, maíz y frijol en temporada de invierno. Ella tiene un grado de escolaridad primario incompleto por lo que no pudo continuar por la falta de apoyo económico por parte de sus padres. Fueron sus padres los que le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra ya que ellos son agricultores y las tierras que trabajan son propias las cuales están ubicadas a una distancia de 10 minutos de camino.

Ella ve la necesidad de darle mantenimiento y asistencia a sus cultivos de café por los que ha solicitado a la cooperativa COMIXMUL un financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas como: fertilizantes, abono, urea, formula cafetalera, etc. 

Sus planes a futuro son los de extender sus cultivos y comprar más tierra para sembrar una mejor variedad de café como: caturra, lempira, que son competitivos en el mercado. Sus sueños como madre es poder darle una educación completa a su hija y que sea mejor cada día que pasa.
texts.en:
Ada, 46, is a farmer and house wife and has one young daughter.  

She works the land especially the coffee, corn and bean plants during winter time, with her domestic partner. 

She did not complete elementary school due to her parents lack of economic resources. Her parents taught her to work the land as they are farmers. Their land is located 10 minutes away walking distance. 


She sees the need to maintain and help her coffee crops which is why she has requested a loan from the COMIXMUL cooperative so she can buy farming supplies such as fertilizers, urea, manure, etc. 

Her future plans are to expand her crops and buy more land in order to plant a bigger variety of coffee such as caturra and lempira which are competitive in the market place. 

Her dream as a mother is to be able to give a full education to her daughter and to make each passing day better.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for coffee crops.

loans.name: Saleh

texts.en:
Saleh is 56 years old, a married woman and mother of four children. One of her sons is shown in the photo. He is a driver by profession and provides transportation services, using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Saleh has applied for a loan of Rs 40,000 for her son. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Saleh is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her son's vehicle.

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en:
Tahira is a 25-year-old married woman living in the Lahore, Pakistan area with her family. Her husband has been successfully running a small general store in a corner of his house for many years. Her husband also assists his younger brother by purchasing stocks of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts over the years. 

Tahira does not have any children, but she hopes that one day God will bless her with a son, and she wants to provide her family with good quality food, clothing, and healthcare in future.

Tahira wants to grow her husband's business.  She requested a loan from Kiva's field partner's BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband could buy more stocks of rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap, biscuits, etc.  With the profit amount she will get better treatment from a specialist lady doctor, so that she can become a mother. 

She is an honest and regular client of BRAC Pakistan.  She is in her third loan cycle with a good repayment history. She is expecting a boost in the earnings, and dreams of expanding the business further in the future.

She is very thankful to Kiva field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy inventory such as flour, cooking oil, pulses, cookies, soaps, shampoo, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Graciela Lucia

texts.es:
Graciela tiene 30 años de edad, es soltera, tiene 2 hijos vive con su familia en el recinto Achín  Cantón Chillanes Provincia Bolívar.

Graciela se dedica a la venta de granos. Solicita el crédito para la compra de granos, como maíz, lenteja, fréjol. 

 Las  compras lo realizan en el Cantón Chillanes.
 Con el apoyo del crédito podrá incrementar su negocio. Su desafío es el dinero. 

Su sueño es comprar una casa y que terminen de estudiar sus hijos.  En el tiempo libre  le gusta  trotar y caminar.
texts.en:
Graciela is 30 years old and single. She has two children and lives with her family in the area of Achín in the Chillanes quarter of Bolívar province.

Graciela sells grains for a living. She is applying for a loan to buy grains such as corn, lentils and beans, which she will purchase in the Chillanes quarter.

With the help of this loan she will be able to improve her business because money is a challenge for her.

Graciela's dream is to buy a house and see her children finish their studies. In her free time she likes to jog and walk.

loans.use: to buy grains such as corn, lentils and beans

loans.name: Boobek

texts.ru: Бообеку 54 года, женат и имеет 3 детей. Супруга домохозяйка помогает ему по хозяйству. В поисках  источника дохода для своей семьи, в 2007 году Бообек начал заниматься полеводством и животноводством. Стартовав с 10,000 сом (KGS), на сегодняшний день его хозяйство приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 5,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве содержит: 1 дойную корову, 1 теленка, 10 овец. Также имеет земельный надел размером 2,10 ГА, где в основном выращивает -фасоль, перец и овощи. Дополнительно Бообек занимается перевозкой пассажиров на своем авто, что приносит ему небольшие доходы. Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бообек обратился в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на закупку удобрений и ядохимикатов. Доходы от кредита Бообек планирует использовать для увеличения поголовья скота, а также на проведение свадьбы своего сына.
texts.en: Boobek is 42 years old, married and has three children.  His spouse is a homemaker and helps him with his work.  While searching for a source of income for his family in 2007, Boobek started farming and working with livestock.  He started his business with 10,000 KGS and today his monthly profits are 5,000 KGS.  In his care he has one dairy cow, one calf, and ten sheep.  He also has a plot of land, 2.10 hectares, where he grows mostly beans, peppers and vegetables.  Boobek also uses his own vehicle to offer taxi services which brings in a little income.  To further develop his business, Boobek turned to the microfinance bank Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 70,000 KGS to buy fertilizer and nitrates.  He plans to use the income from the loan to increase his herd and also to pay for his son's wedding.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and nitrates

loans.name: Faiziddin

texts.ru:
Файзиддин добродушный и благоразумный человек. Ему 51 год. Он имеет жену и троих детей. Старшему сыну 28 лет и он женат и имеет одного сына. Второму сыну 21 год, он еще холост, а младшей дочери 18 лет. Файзиддин всей семьей  живет в районе Хуросон. В данный момент его сыновья находятся на заработках в России и за счет их высланных денег Файзиддин накопил сбережение в размере 550 долларов США. Файзиддин имеет намерение начать животноводческий бизнес. С такой целью он просит кредит в размере 2000 долларов США. Файзиддин на все деньги - на сумму кредита и сбережения хочет купить 5-голов бычков и корм. У него уже есть свой бизнес план по купле и продаже скота, а также при дворе дома имеется коровник размером 6x3 метра. Файзиддин позитивно настроен и верит, что его бизнес станет успешным и будет приносить ему хороший доход. 
У Файзиддина большие планы на будущее. В дальнейшем он будет расширять бизнес и откроет ферму.
texts.en: Faiziddin is a good-natured and wise man.  He is 51 years old, married and has three children.  His oldest son is 28 years old, he's married and has one son himself.  His second oldest son is 21 years old, still a bachelor, and the youngest is a daughter, 18 years of age.  Faiziddin lives with his family in Khuroson, Tajikistan.  His sons are currently in Russia as migrant workers and Faiziddin has saved 550 USD of the money they've sent home.  He intends on starting a livestock business.  With this goal, he is asking for a loan of 2,000 USD.  He will use his savings and the money from the loan to buy five bulls and their feed.  He already has a business plan to buy and sell the animals, and has a corral for them near his home that is six by three meters.  Faiziddin has a positive attitude and believes his business will be successful and provide a good income.  He has big plans for the future.  He wants to expand his business and start a farm.

loans.use: to buy five bulls and their feed in order to start a new livestock business.

loans.name: Pathani

texts.en:
Pathani, age 34, sells animals with the support of her husband, who is also shown in the photo. She buys baby goats and calves to raise, and then her husband sells them in the market for a profit. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income.

A dedicated mother of four, Pathani needs to improve her business and increase her income to meet the needs of her children. She has therefore applied for her second loan from Kashf Foundation for Rs. 30,000 to purchase another cow.

loans.use: to purchase another cow.

loans.name: Francisca María

texts.es: La cliente es de la zona de Orquídeas en Guayaquil.  Tiempo atrás tuvo la oportunidad de estar en un curso de panadería y desde aquel entonces, le ha gustado mucho esta actividad.  Después montó su propia panadería y tuvo buena acogida, por lo que decidió también incorporar víveres y artículos de despensa para su venta.  No es casada pero tiene hijos que ya son mayores de edad.  Planea para el futuro poder ver culminar la carrera universitaria de su hijo, viajar a su tierra y también incrementar sustancialmente su negocio.  Necesita el dinero para la compra de insumos de panadería y despensa.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the District of Orquídeas in Guayaquil. Some time ago, she had the opportunity to take a baking course and has enjoyed this activity ever since. Afterwards, she established her own bakery and experienced a good reception. She also decided to add basic staples and food products to her store.

The borrower is not married, but she has children who are already grown. In the future she plans to see her son finish his university degree, travel to the country, and increase her business substantially. She needs the money in order to buy baking supplies and food products for her store.

loans.use: to buy baking supplies and food products.

loans.name: Cecibel Fabiola

texts.es: La cliente vive en la zona de Orquídeas en Guayaquil.  Desde pequeña le han gustado mucho las manualidades y por eso escogió emprender en esta actividad.  Realiza su trabajo sola durante el día en diferentes horarios.  Es casada y tiene un hijo menor de edad que estudia en la escuela fiscal.  Sueña poder tener su local propio para comercializar sus productos e incrementar sus ganancias.  Desea del dinero del préstamo para comprar materiales (fomix) y también herramientas para la elaboración de manualidades.
texts.en: Cecibel Fabiola lives in the Orquídeas neighborhood of Guayaquil.  Ever since she was young she has enjoyed making handicrafts, and so she chose to start up a business in this line of work.  She works on her own during the day according to a varied schedule.  She is married and has a minor child who attends public school.  She has a dream of establishing her own shop where she could sell her products and increase her earnings.  She wants to use the money from this loan to buy supplies (such as craft foam) and also tools for her craft business.

loans.use: to buy tools, materials and supplies for her handicraft business

loans.name: Jose Rafael

texts.es:
El Señor José en una persona muy trabajadora y responsable vive junto a su esposa y su hijo en una comunidad al sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la pesca y venta de mariscos en su comunidad.
Don José el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de redes para pesca de camarón y pescado, las cuales el necesita para seguir realizando su trabajo. El espera que el préstamo le sirva de mucha ayuda ya que contara con las herramientas necesarias para desarrollar su trabajo de manera constante y así cubrir los pedidos de sus clientes.
Don José espera que sus  ingresos aumenten y que se vea reflejado en su estilo de vida su sueño es que su negocio continúe creciendo y que sea uno de los  más reconocido de su comunidad para apoyar a su  familia y que su hijo continúe con los estudios y tengan mayores oportunidades en la vida.




Choluteca, Honduras – Julio 2013
texts.en:
José is a very hardworking and responsible person. He lives with his wife and son in a community in southern Honduras. His business is fishing and selling seafood in his community.  

José needs the loan to buy fishing nets for shrimp and fish, which he needs to keep doing his job. He hopes that the loan will be a big help since he will have the tools he needs to develop his work and cover his customers' orders. 

José hopes that his income will rise and for that to be reflected in his lifestyle. His dream is to keep growing and to be one of the best known people in his community to support his family and for his son to keep going to school and have more opportunities in life.




Choluteca, Honduras – Julio 2013

loans.use: to buy fishing nets for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two boxes of tomatoes and bananas.

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
Doña Paula es una persona muy luchadora y responsable vive junto a sus hijos y su esposo en una comunidad al sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la venta de mariscos de manera ambulante en su comunidad y demás caseríos cercanos a la misma. 
Doña Paula necesita el préstamo para la compra de babosa, curriles, curvina, pancha, wicho, etc. Los cuales necesita para seguir realizando su negocio. Ella espera que el préstamo le sirva de mucho ya que contara con los productos necesarios para seguir  realizando su trabajo y cubriendo la demanda que tiene de sus clientes.
Doña Paula espera que le genere ingresos que le permitan mejorar su negocio y su calidad de vida al igual la de su familia, su sueño es que su negocio crezca en unos años y así poder seguir apoyando a su familia para que cumplan sus metas y sueños como el de que sus hijos no dejen de estudiar y así puedan tener mayores oportunidades en el futuro




Choluteca, Honduras – Julio 2013
texts.en:
Paula is a responsible person who is a fighter. She lives with her children and her husband in a community in southern Honduras. Her business is selling selling seafood as a street vendor in her com,unity and others nearby hers.  

Paula needs the loan to buy mollusks, curriles, sea bass, pancha, wicho, etc. She needs these to continue in her business. She hopes that the loan will help her a lot, since she will have the products she needs to keep doing her work and covering her customers' demands. 

Paula hopes to generate income that will generate income to improve her business and her quality of life. Her dream is for her business to grow and in a few years be able to help her family meet its goals and dreams, like her children staying in school and having more opportunities in the future.  




Choluteca, Honduras – July 2013

loans.use: para la compra de babosa, curriles, curvina, pancha, wicho, etc para su negocio

loans.name: Flora María

texts.es: La cliente es del sector de Orquídeas en Guayaquil.  Tiempo atrás vio la posibilidad de instalar un negocio en el barrio de su casa, debido a que cerca de él existe una cancha que cuenta con una numerosa concurrencia de gente.  Trabaja durante el día en diversos horarios.  No es casada, pero tiene un hijo que ya es mayor de edad.  Desea a futuro poder tener más ganancias en su  negocio, comprar un vehículo y mejorar su casa.  Ahora, necesita el crédito para comprar gaseosas e implementos para la cocina de su negocio.
texts.en: This borrower is from the Orquídeas neighborhood of Guayaquil.  Some time ago, she saw the possibility of setting up a business in the neighborhood where she lives, since nearby there is a sports field that is always busy with many people.  She works during the day according to a varied schedule.  She is not married, but she has a grown child.  In the future, she wants to generate more earnings from her business so that she can buy a car and improve her house.  At this time she needs a loan to buy soft drinks and kitchen utensils for her business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and kitchen utensils

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Doña Juana tiene 56 años de edad y es una mujer muy emprendedora, honesta, trabajadora y luchadora ya que desde muy temprano ella se levanta para cumplir con sus compromisos hogareños y del campo. Su familia está compuesta por 6 miembros incluyendo a sus esposo en donde todos se sienten muy comprometidos como una familia unida y con el desarrollo de la misma. Ella tiene mucha experiencia ya que trabaja la tierra hace más de 35 años gracias a sus padres que fueron quienes le enseñaron y heredaron la tierra que hoy en día trabaja con su familia la cual está ubicada a 6 kilómetros de su casa de habitación.

Doña Juana ha solicitado a la cooperativa COMIXMUL un financiamiento para fortalecer sus cultivos de café con el cual comprara abono, foliares, urea, formula cafetalera para dar mantenimiento a sus cultivos y aprovechara la zona donde están ya que es apta para el mismo por su tierra y su clima cálido. 

Doña Juana tiene la esperanza de dar una mejor y excelente apariencia a sus cultivos de café para hacerlos más atractivos para sus clientes ya que ella sueña con mejorar la condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Juana is 56 years old. She is an enterprising, honest, hardworking woman who is a fighter. She gets up very early to meet her commitments in her home and in the fields. Her family is made up of 6 members, including her husband. They are very committed as a united family and to its development. She has a lot of experience, since she learned to work the earth more than 35 years ago, thanks to her parents, who taught her and left her the land that she works now with her family. It is located 6 kilometers from her home. 

Juana has asked the COMIXMUL cooperative for a loan to fortify her coffee crops. With it, she will buy fertilizer, foliar fertilizer, urea, coffee formula to maintain her crops and make use of the area where they are, since it is suitable for it because of its soil and warm climate.

Juana hopes to give her crops an excellent appearance to make them more attractive to her customers. She dreams of improving the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials to maintain her coffee crops.

loans.name: Saidmurod

texts.ru: Саидмуроду 47 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Его жена Зулфиямо работает в школе учительницей. Саидмурод имеет высшее образование. Он работает милиционером. Саидмурод честный и трудолюбивый человек. Он хочет, чтобы его дети получили высшее образование. Его сын учится в университете и Саидмурод должен оплатить за учебный договор своего сына. Так как Саидмурод является основным кормильцем семьи, он тратит свою зарплату для обеспечения семьи и поэтому не смог сделать сбережения для оплаты учебы своего сына в университете. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университете. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Saidmurod is 47 years old.  He is married and has 2 children. His wife Zulfiyamo works as a schoolteacher. Saidmurod has a higher education. He works as a police officer. Saidmurod is an honest and hardworking person. He wants his children to receive higher education. His son is a university student, and Saidmurod need to pay for his tuition. Because Saidmurod is the main breadwinner for his family, he spends all of his salary on providing for his family.  Therefore, he cannot save up money to pay for his son's tuition at university.  He has requested a loan to pay for tuition at the university.  He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for his son’s education

loans.name: Muhamadjon

texts.ru: Мухамадчон скотовод и земледелец, проживающий в районе Б.Гафуров города Худжанд. Ему 38 лет. У него жена и трое детей. Старшей дочери 17 лет, второй дочери 14 лет и младшему сыну 10 лет. Все дети учатся в школе, а жена работает в школе учительницей. Мухамадчон обеспечивает семью за счет животноводческой деятельности и земледелия. Он в течение 10 лет выращивает крупнорогатый скот для продажи. Он научился этому бизнесу у своего брата. Сейчас в хозяйстве Мухамадчона имеется только одна корова. Для продолжения деятельности ему необходимо увеличить поголовье скота. С такой целью он обратился за кредитом и хочет купить двух коров. Одновременно Мухамадчон занимается земледелием. Он на большом участке земли выращивает сельскохозяйственную культуру.
texts.en: Muhamadjon is a cattle rancher and farmer who lives in the B.Gafurov region in Khujand city.  He is 38 years old.  He is married and has three children. The oldest daughter is 17 years old, the second oldest daughter is 14, and the younger son is 10. All of the children study at the school, and the wife works as a teacher at the school. Muhamadjon provides for his family through livestock raising and agriculture. Over the last ten years, he has been raising cattle for sale. He learned this business from his brother. Right now, Muhamadjon only has one cow. In order to continue his business, he needs to increase the amount of cattle he has. With this goal, he has requested a loan and hopes to purchase two cows. At the same time, Muhamadjon engages in agriculture.  He grows crops on a large plot of land.

loans.use: to purchase two cows in order to increase the amount of livestock

loans.name: La Ceiba Us Group

texts.es:
La señora Raymunda es madre soltera, tiene 35 años de edad, curso en la esceula primaria completa, tiene 5 hijos y los 5 estan estudiando, se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente a la siembra de cardamomo, inició este negocio por la enseñanza de sus padres y hasta el momento lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su familia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que le servirá para el pago de peones para la cosecha de cardamomo, desea en el futuro proximo poder tener un capital gande para ampliar su cultivo de cardamomo y obtener mejores ganancias. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la siembra de cardamomo. En la fotografía aparecen 21 personas pero, solo a 19 se les concedió el préstamo.
texts.en:
Sra. Raymunda is a 35-year-old single mother who finished her primary school education. She has five children, all of whom are studying. Raymunda is a farmer who specifically grows cardamom. She started this business after her parents taught her this trade and now she has 10 years of experience as well as the support of her family.

Raymunda organized a group so that she could request a loan. The money will be used to pay her workers who harvest the cardamom. In the future, she wants to have more capital so that she can expand her cardamom crop and generate better earnings.

The other group members also grow cardamom. There are 21 people who appear in the photograph, but only 19 of them are participating in the loan.

loans.use: to pay her workers who harvest cardamom.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a seventy-three-year-old man, married to Grace and a father of four children who are all adults. He is a dairy farmer, and he also owns rental hosues. He has been in this business for fifty-three years and earns a monthly income of sixty-five-thousand shillings.

This will be Peter's seventh loan with KADET LTD. He has repaid all other loans. He plans to use the entire loan to buy one dairy cow and animal feed. He hopes to improve his living standards in the future.

loans.use: To purchase one dairy cow and animal feed

loans.name: Maku

texts.en:
Maku is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past three years, she has operated a Khanga (women's wrap clothes) business. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation and inadequate capital. She dreams of expanding and establishing a wholesale shop in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting she wants to purchase bales of Khanga (women's wrap clothes) for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of Khanga (women's wrap clothes) for resale.

loans.name: Muksan

texts.en: Muksan is a 47-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality. With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business; currently she requested a loan of Rs. 40,000 to purchase another buffalo. This will help her to increase her sales which will ultimately help in generating more income for her.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Rasoolan

texts.en: Rasoolan is a 24-year-old married woman. For many years, she has been successfully running a business of milk sales in her community. Over time, she has become famous in her area for providing good quality milk. She counts on a good client list and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She has some past savings and now she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 to Kashf Foundation to purchase one more cow. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend her profits on expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Ghulam  Biwi

texts.en: Ghulam Biwi is a 33-year-old married woman and mother of three children. The man shown in the photo is her husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it functional. For this reason, Ghulam Biwi has applied for a loan of Rs 20,000 for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transportation service to his passengers. She is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Aminjon

texts.ru: Аминджону 18 лет. Он не женат и живет с родителями. Аминджон учился в средней школе отлично и активно участвовал во всех внеклассных мероприятиях школы. Он в этом году окончил среднюю школу и поступил в университет. Он поступил в Национальный Университет Таджикистана. Аминджон надеется, что в университет он будет учиться тоже успешно. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Его родители тоже не в состоянии поддержать его, так как они простые рабочие и имеют маленький доход. Аминджон запрашивает займ на сумму 550 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту. В будущем он мечтает стать хорошим специалистом.
texts.en: Aminjon is 18 years old.  He is unmarried and lives with his parents. Aminjon studied well in school and actively participated in all extra-curricular activities of the school. He has finished school this year and is entered university. He enrolled at the National University of Tajikistan. Aminjon hopes that he will be a successful student at the university as well. He has to pay the tuition, but does not have money. His parents are also unable to support him, because they are simple workers and have little income. Aminjon has requested a loan in the amount of $550 U.S. dollars to pay for tuition. He awaits your kindness. In the future, he wants to become a good specialist.

loans.use: To pay for his tuition

loans.name: Yessica Marina

texts.es: La cliente vive en la ciudad de Machala.  Desde que terminó el colegio. le gustó la venta de papelería y suministros de oficina, así como el oficio de estilista.  Por esta razón montó un negocio en donde pudiera ejercer ambas actividades  de manera simultánea.  Trabaja sola, durante la mañana atienede el negocio de papelería/bazar y por las tardes se dedica al gabinete.  Está separada pero el padre de sus hijos le pasa una mensualidad para sus gastos.  Sus 2 hijos estudian en la escuela fiscal del sector donde viven.  Necesita comprar mercadería (libros, cuadernos) e implementos para el gabinete.
texts.en: Yessica Marina lives in the city of Machala.  Ever since she finished school, she has enjoyed selling paper goods and office supplies.  She also works as a hair stylist.  For this reason, she started up a business where she could do both activities at the same time.  She works alone in the mornings, tending to her stationery store, and in the afternoons she works in her salon.  She is separated, but the father of her children sends a monthly stipend for their expenses.  Her 2 children attend public school in the neighborhood where they live.  Yessica Marina needs to buy merchandise (books, notebooks) and equipment for her salon.

loans.use: to buy books, notebooks and equipment for her salon

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm oil, onions, margi, pepper, etc., in bulk to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Clara Luz

texts.es: La cliente reside en Machala.  Inició su negocio vendiendo poco a poco a diferentes personas del sector donde vive, por medio de los catálogos y visitándolos en sus domicilios.  Hasta ahora le ha ido muy bien, y su esposo la ayuda cuando sale en la noche, dado que mayormente, ella trabaja sola durante el resto del día.  Su esposo trabaja como mecánico en un taller y tienen 1 hijo que estudia en la escuela fiscal del barrio.  Necesita el crédito para la compra de artículos de la línea Avon y Yanbal.
texts.en: Clara Luz lives in Machala.  She started out her business gradually, selling items through catalogs to different people in the neighborhood where she lives by visiting them in their homes.  Up to now, it's gone very well.  Her husband helps her when she sells at night, but she generally works on her own during the rest of the day.  Her husband works as a mechanic in a workshop, and they have a child who attends the local public school.  Clara Luz needs this loan to buy Avon and Yanbal brand products.

loans.use: to buy Avon and Yanbal brand products

loans.name: Shamshad

texts.en: Shamshad is a 45-year-old married woman and a mother of six. Her husband is a laborer. It was very tough for Shamshad to manage her household needs with the small income of her husband. Therefore, she decided to help her husband by earning money, and she started her business of clothes sales. She buys cloth in various colors; then, after stitching and designing, she sells them to the people of her locality.  Now, she is playing a very important role for her family. To cope with the increasing demands of her customers, she needs to purchase more spools of thread and bundles of cloth in different colors. For this reason, she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 from Kashf Foundation. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend the part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of thread and bundles of cloth in different colors.

loans.name: Ratkhan

texts.ru: Ратхан, 61 год, вдова, имеет 5 детей (2 сына и 3 дочери). После смерти мужа, кормильца семьи в поиске доходов для своей семьи Ратхан стала заниматься животноводством. Бизнес начала с 11,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря ее непосильному труду и емкой работе Ратхан достигла небольших успехов в развитии хозяйства и стала получать ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 10 000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Ратхан имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 30 овец. По хозяйству помогает самый младший сын. Старший сын проживает отдельно и помогает материально. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Ратхан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы и овец. Доходы от кредита Ратхан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота в своем хозяйстве, а также в будущем планирует построить новый дом.
texts.en: Ratkhan is 61 years old, widowed, and has 5 children (2 sons and 3 daughters). After the death of her husband, who was the breadwinner of the family, Ratkhan became involved in animal husbandry in order to provide for her family. She started the business with 10,000 somons (KGS). Thanks to her tireless labor and hard work, Ratkhan achieved some success and has been receiving a monthly profit of 10,000 somons (KGS). Today, Ratkhan has 4 dairy cows and 30 sheep on her farm. Her youngest son helps her with the business. Her oldest son lives separately and helps out financially. In order to further grow her business, Ratkhan asked the Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 somons (KGS) for the purchase of one cow and some sheep. Ratkhan plans to invest the income from the loan in order to further increase in the number of livestock on her farm, and plans to build a new home in the future.

loans.use: to buy cow and sheep

loans.name: Duaa

texts.en: Duaa is 22 years old. She lives in Irbid, Jordan with her family, which consists of 5 members: 3 brothers and 1 sister. One of her brothers owns a restaurant. Duaa is studying for a Bachelor of Marketing at The Yarmouk University, which is located in Irbid. Duaa is planning to work in her study field after graduation to earn income and be able to depend on herself and to help her family. She is currently facing financial problems, so she is asking for a loan to be able to pay for her study fees.

loans.use: To pay for her study fees

loans.name: Khadija

texts.en:
Khadija is married and has five school-going children. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past eight years, Khadija has operated a paraffin-selling business. She cites transportation and inadequate capital as her major challenges. 

With the 20,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase jerrycans of paraffin for her business. 

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business. She dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase jerrycans of paraffin for her business.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is 20 years old. She is single and has eight siblings. She lives in Mafraq, Jordan. Sarah is currently studying for her Bachelor of Psychological Counseling degree, in her second year. She is planning to work in her field of study in the future to earn income, which will help her cover her family's needs. As Sarah is facing financial problems, she is requesting a loan to pay for her semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her semester fees.

loans.name: Imtiyaz's Group

texts.en:
Imtiaz is a 52-year-old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is passing her life happily with her five children; one of her sons is married, but does not have a proper job to support a single family. Imtiaz wants to start a business for her elder son selling vegetables, but she has already spent all of her savings on her son's marriage ceremony. She has a greater need of money, so that she can manage the initial capital for the vegetable vending business, but none of her relatives financially support her.

Therefore, she presented her humble request to Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, and after understanding the terms and conditions, she applied for a loan of Rs. 25,000. With this loan, she can easily start the small business for her son.

Imtiaz has grown old and worried about her sons because, until now, none of her sons much settled in their businesses. She hopes that her son will settle in this newly started business and will be able to support the family alone. 

Imtiaz is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. 

Note: Imtiaz is raising her hand in the given picture.

loans.use: to buy fresh vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Thawra

texts.en:
Thawra is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Thawra is a 24-year-old married woman from Rafah City. She is a mother to three young sons. Thawra's husband works as an employee in the public sector. His income is low and barely covers the monthly expenses for the family. Thawra and her husband would like to improve their home and their living conditions. They would like to buy all the needed home appliances and furniture for the family home. 

Thawra took a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help Thawra to buy some needed home appliances, such as a refrigerator. It is very important to keep the food in it, since the weather is very hot in Rafah City. This will improve the family's living conditions.

Thawra and her husband would like to take out a bigger loan in the future and buy a better home.

loans.use: to buy some needed home appliances, such as a refrigerator.

loans.name: Iman
